title: Powerful >>> Popular
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss Deion Sanders getting the #2 recruit in the country to sign with Jackson State, if they'd rather start an NBA franchise with LaMelo Ball or Anthony Edwards, Deron Williams beating Frank Gore in a boxing match, and big man celebrations on the football field. Let's get it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
